channel.title: Starter lost on login sometimes?
channel.description:
okay well i use czar, but i have the starter given on login...
i dont think it saves there file correctly, heres my give starter void, any1 got an idea so it actualy gives them the items, then saves there file, so if they get disconnected, they keep there stuff?

saveAllItems = true;
disconnected = true;
